name: Omen of Rain
description:
Omen of Rain is a very short story/adventure game thing made by illydna in RPG Maker VX Ace.

You play as Hans, who, after fifteen years, has returned to the old hideout where he used to play with his friends.

It's mostly calm and atmospheric, with some minor dark things. (There are no jumpscares, though!)

CREDITS
